title: 💰 Lending & Borrowing Management
changes: 🆕 Brand new Lending & Borrowing section to track money you lend to others or borrow from friends
📊 Smart dashboard cards showing total lent, borrowed, and net amounts with beautiful carousel navigation
👥 Group transactions by person to easily track individual balances and see who owes you what
✏️ Easy editing with modal popups - click edit to modify any lending/borrowing record
📱 Fully mobile-responsive design that works perfectly on phones and tablets
🌙 Complete dark/light theme support for all lending features
💾 Enhanced data export now includes all your lending data for complete backups
🔄 Smart import system that works with both old expense-only files and new complete backups

title: Major Bug Fixes & Dark Mode Improvements
changes: 🔧 Fixed critical bug: Editing expense dates to different months now works correctly without duplication
🔧 Improved expense editing logic to properly handle month changes and clean up empty months
🌙 Enhanced dark mode visibility: All secondary text is now clearly visible in both light and dark themes
🎨 Added custom CSS classes for better text contrast across different color schemes
Bug fix: The What's New updates list now scrolls smoothly, and the 'Got it!' button stays in place so you can close it anytime.
Bug fix: Removed date suffixes like 'st', 'nd', 'rd', and 'th' for a cleaner, easier-to-read date format.

title: Expense Management Revamped
changes: Replaced edit/delete buttons with a cleaner popover menu.
Introduced a modal for editing expenses to improve usability.
Moved category totals next to the category name for a cleaner look.
Improved date display to be more readable (e.g., '8th Tue').
Enhanced popover and modal to follow the application's light/dark theme.
Description is now optional when adding a new expense.
Introduced floating action button for faster expense entry.
Amounts are automatically rounded to two decimals.
Expense categories can now be renamed or deleted.
Added category management options inside the expense list.
Dark-mode toggle added for a better night experience.
Improved dashboard performance.
New Split Calculator available from the sidebar.
Initial release of Spending Tracker!
